name: Masquerade (itch) (muramasa)
description:
Synopsis

You control a young shaman apprentice, who leaps for the first time into the world of spirits. Find your way through the spiritual world, with the help of the powers that the natural masks give you, and unmask the secrets of the spirits!

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow keys - Movement
  • Z, Space - Jump
  • X, Shift - Special (varies with some masks, usually grab enemy mask)
Gamepad supported! 
  • A - Jump 
  • B - Special

 

Made as entry for This is Costa Rica Jam, 2021
